name: Project White Ball
description:
Controls:  PC - up and down arrow keys

Android: touch  upper screen half and lower screen half

IMPORTANT NOTE: if you play on android , please go into the game settings and set the sensitivity to min. 0.1. Otherwise the game will not work. 

Languages: English , German  (coming soon), French  (coming soon), Spanish  (coming soon)

_____________________________

New in V0.5:

-New Slow Motion Power up

-Multi language support (adds German, French and Spanish)

-Music now stays  on/off when you close and return to the game

-Pause button added

-Better Shop UI

-Bug fixes

-Slow Motion

-Unlockable colors
